results.content: Very concise, showed how to fix problems.  Very detailed.  Would highly recommend, and I intend to watch it many times.

results.content: Enjoyed and I have learnt a lot from this course. Instructor is very friendly and explaining clearly. Great for the beginners and I highly recommend.

results.content: It's a good introduction to DIVI 3.0, but it's lacking on how to take those skills and use them to be a freelance wordpress developer/designer.

results.content:
Easy to watch and fun to learn. Instructor will quickly walk you with customisation of website and it's so easy to do with wordpress. Just loved the way of direct talk. Best part is he doesn't skip any step
I recommend this.

results.content: A great course to really master DIVI.
results.content_html: A great course to really master DIVI.

results.content:
It covered everything I needed to overcome the hurdle of developing custom Wordpress themes and provided me the foundation to expand the skills beyond the course material.
I have converted my static custom theme into dynamic Wordpress theme with such an ease after I have watched this course. I did come back couple of times to some parts of the course, but generally, everything is so clear and well explained.
Advanced Custom Fields, slider, section and everything is just amazing. I got more confidence since I understand what wordpress is and how powerful it is. Thanks alot Saksham.
results.content_html:

results.content: I dont find this course useful
very clear instructions and good explanation

Leaved this rating because this course was the best i've ever tried! Learned so many new tools to be a better wordpress web developer! :)

Thanks Saksham :)
